tool_contract.description:
Summarizes depth of coverage from an AlignmentSet file.

Ported from summarize_coverage.py in pbreports/reports, which was ported from
summarizeCoverage.py in pbpy/bin.

pb_option.name: Number of regions
pb_option.description: Desired number of genome regions in the summary statistics (used for guidance, not strict). Defaults to 1000

pbreports.task_options.num_regions.description: Desired number of genome regions in the summary statistics (used for guidance, not strict). Defaults to 1000
pbreports.task_options.num_regions.title: Number of regions

pb_option.name: Region size
pb_option.description: If supplied, used a fixed genomic region size

pbreports.task_options.region_size.description: If supplied, used a fixed genomic region size
pbreports.task_options.region_size.title: Region size

pb_option.name: Maximum region size
pb_option.description: Upper limit for genomic region size (ignored if region_size is set explicitly)

pbreports.task_options.max_region_size.description: Upper limit for genomic region size (ignored if region_size is set explicitly)
pbreports.task_options.max_region_size.title: Maximum region size

pb_option.name: Force the number of regions
pb_option.description: If supplied, then try to use this number (max value = 40000) of regions per reference, otherwise the coverage summary report will optimize the number of regions in the case of many references.  Not compatible with a fixed region size.

pbreports.task_options.force_num_regions.description: If supplied, then try to use this number (max value = 40000) of regions per reference, otherwise the coverage summary report will optimize the number of regions in the case of many references.  Not compatible with a fixed region size.
pbreports.task_options.force_num_regions.title: Force the number of regions

output_types.title: Coverage Summary
output_types.description: Coverage summary for regions (bins) spanning the reference

tool_contract.name: Summarize Coverage
